comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: I tried to create an account here, my email was verified and 2FA as well was enabled but I don't see where to submit the KYC.I looked at all in the platform but really don't see it where?Why is that? Shouldn't it be right there in your FMC account that the KYC submission can be seen immediately, although there is a KYC but it can't be clicked.
